trans-unit.source: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of getnative's Website.
trans-unit.target: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of getnative's Website.

trans-unit.source: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use getnative's website if you do not accept all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
trans-unit.target: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use getnative's website if you do not accept all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

trans-unit.source: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and any or all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person accessing this website and accepting the Company's terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves, or either the Client or ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner, whether by formal meetings of a fixed duration, or any other means, for the express purpose of meeting the Client's needs in respect of provision of the Company's stated services/products, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Japan. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalisation and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.
trans-unit.target: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and any or all Agreements: "Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person accessing this website and accepting the Company's terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves, or either the Client or ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner, whether by formal meetings of a fixed duration, or any other means, for the express purpose of meeting the Client's needs in respect of provision of the Company's stated services/products, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Japan. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalisation and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same.

trans-unit.source: We employ the use of cookies. By using getnative's website you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with getnative's privacy policy. Most of the modern day interactive web sites use cookies to enable us to retrieve user details for each visit. Cookies are used in some areas of our site to enable the functionality of this area and ease of use for those people visiting. Some of our affiliate / advertising partners may also use cookies.
trans-unit.target: We employ the use of cookies. By using getnative's website you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with getnative's privacy policy. trans-unit.source: This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof. Certain parts of this website offer the opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions, information, material and data ('Comments') in areas of the website. getnative does not screen, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their appearance on the website and Comments do not reflect the views or opinions of getnative, its agents or affiliates. Comments reflect the view and opinion of the person who posts such view or opinion. To the extent permitted by applicable laws getnative shall not be responsible or liable for the Comments or for any loss cost, liability, damages or expenses caused and or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. getnative reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which it considers in its absolute discretion to be inappropriate, offensive or otherwise in breach of these Terms and Conditions. You warrant and represent that: You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so; The Comments do not infringe any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark, or other proprietary right of any third party; The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material or material which is an invasion of privacy The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity. You hereby grant to getnative a non-exclusive royalty-free license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.

To the extent permitted by applicable laws getnative shall not be responsible or liable for the Comments or for any loss cost, liability, damages or expenses caused and or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website. getnative reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which it considers in its absolute discretion to be inappropriate, offensive or otherwise in breach of these Terms and Conditions. trans-unit.source: If you are among the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must notify us by sending an e-mail to contact@getnativelearning.com. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information (such as a phone number and/or e-mail address) as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Web site, and a list of the URL(s) on our site to which you would like to link. Allow 2-3 weeks for a response.
trans-unit.target: If you are among the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must notify us by sending an e-mail to contact@getnativelearning.com. trans-unit.source: This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their 'Personally Identifiable Information' (PII) is being used online. PII, as described in US privacy law and information security, is information that can be used on its own or with other information to identify, contact, or locate a single person, or to identify an individual in context. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our website.
trans-unit.target: This privacy policy has been compiled to better serve those who are concerned with how their 'Personally Identifiable Information' (PII) is being used online. PII, as described in US privacy law and information security, is information that can be used on its own or with other information to identify, contact, or locate a single person, or to identify an individual in context. Please read our privacy policy carefully to get a clear understanding of how we collect, use, protect or otherwise handle your Personally Identifiable Information in accordance with our website.

trans-unit.source: What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our blog, website or app?
trans-unit.target: What personal information do we collect from the people that visit our blog, website or app?

trans-unit.source: When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your name, email address or other details to help you with your experience.
trans-unit.target: When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your name, email address or other details to help you with your experience.

trans-unit.source: We collect information from you when you register on our site, Open a Support Ticket or enter information on our site.
trans-unit.target: We collect information from you when you register on our site, Open a Support Ticket or enter information on our site.

trans-unit.source: Provide us with feedback on our products or services
trans-unit.target: Provide us with feedback on our products or services

trans-unit.source: How do we use your information?
trans-unit.target: How do we use your information?

trans-unit.source: We may use the information we collect from you when you register, make a purchase, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication, surf the website or use certain other site features in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: We may use the information we collect from you when you register, make a purchase, sign up for our newsletter, respond to a survey or marketing communication, surf the website or use certain other site features in the following ways:

trans-unit.source: To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested.
trans-unit.target: To personalize your experience and to allow us to deliver the type of content and product offerings in which you are most interested.

trans-unit.source: To improve our website in order to better serve you.
trans-unit.target: To improve our website in order to better serve you.

trans-unit.source: To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests.
trans-unit.target: To allow us to better service you in responding to your customer service requests.

trans-unit.source: To send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services.
trans-unit.target: To send periodic emails regarding your order or other products and services.

trans-unit.source: How do we protect your information?
trans-unit.target: How do we protect your information?

trans-unit.source: We do not use vulnerability scanning and/or scanning to PCI standards.
trans-unit.target: We do not use vulnerability scanning and/or scanning to PCI standards.

trans-unit.source: We only provide sections and information. We never ask for credit card numbers.
trans-unit.target: We only provide sections and information. We never ask for credit card numbers.

trans-unit.source: We do not use Malware Scanning.
trans-unit.target: We do not use Malware Scanning.

trans-unit.source: Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive/credit information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology.
trans-unit.target: Your personal information is contained behind secured networks and is only accessible by a limited number of persons who have special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. In addition, all sensitive/credit information you supply is encrypted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology.

trans-unit.source: We implement a variety of security measures when a user enters, submits, or accesses their information to maintain the safety of your personal information.
trans-unit.target: We implement a variety of security measures when a user enters, submits, or accesses their information to maintain the safety of your personal information.

trans-unit.source: All transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers.
trans-unit.target: All transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers.

trans-unit.source: Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
trans-unit.target: Yes. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. For instance, we use cookies to help us remember and process the items in your shopping cart. They are also used to help us understand your preferences based on previous or current site activity, which enables us to provide you with improved services. We also use cookies to help us compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.

trans-unit.source: Understand and save user's preferences for future visits.
trans-unit.target: Understand and save user's preferences for future visits.

trans-unit.source: Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may also use trusted third-party services that track this information on our behalf.
trans-unit.target: Compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interactions in order to offer better site experiences and tools in the future. We may also use trusted third-party services that track this information on our behalf.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies. You do this through your browser settings. Since browser is a little different, look at your browser's Help Menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to have your computer warn you each time a cookie is being sent, or you can choose to turn off all cookies. You do this through your browser settings. Since browser is a little different, look at your browser's Help Menu to learn the correct way to modify your cookies.

trans-unit.source: If you turn cookies off, some features will be disabled. It won't affect the user's experience that make your site experience more efficient and may not function properly.
trans-unit.target: If you turn cookies off, some features will be disabled. It won't affect the user's experience that make your site experience more efficient and may not function properly.

trans-unit.source: However, you will still be able to place orders.
trans-unit.target: However, you will still be able to place orders.

trans-unit.source: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release information when it's release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.
trans-unit.target: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your Personally Identifiable Information unless we provide users with advance notice. This does not include website hosting partners and other parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or serving our users, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release information when it's release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

trans-unit.source: We do not include or offer third-party products or services on our website.
trans-unit.target: We do not include or offer third-party products or services on our website.

trans-unit.source: We use Google AdSense Advertising on our website.
trans-unit.target: We use Google AdSense Advertising on our website.

trans-unit.source: Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on our site. Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to our users based on previous visits to our site and other sites on the Internet. Users may opt-out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google Ad and Content Network privacy policy.
trans-unit.target: Google, as a third-party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on our site. Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to our users based on previous visits to our site and other sites on the Internet. Users may opt-out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google Ad and Content Network privacy policy.

trans-unit.source: We, along with third-party vendors such as Google use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookies) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) or other third-party identifiers together to compile data regarding user interactions with ad impressions and other ad service functions as they relate to our website.
trans-unit.target: We, along with third-party vendors such as Google use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookies) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) or other third-party identifiers together to compile data regarding user interactions with ad impressions and other ad service functions as they relate to our website.

trans-unit.source: Opting out: Users can set preferences for how Google advertises to you using the Google Ad Settings page. Alternatively, you can opt out by visiting the Network Advertising Initiative Opt Out page or by using the Google Analytics Opt Out Browser add on.
trans-unit.target: Opting out: Users can set preferences for how Google advertises to you using the Google Ad Settings page. Alternatively, you can opt out by visiting the Network Advertising Initiative Opt Out page or by using the Google Analytics Opt Out Browser add on.

trans-unit.source: The Fair Information Practices Principles form the backbone of privacy law in the United States and the concepts they include have played a significant role in the development of data protection laws around the globe. Understanding the Fair Information Practice Principles and how they should be implemented is critical to comply with the various privacy laws that protect personal information.
trans-unit.target: The Fair Information Practices Principles form the backbone of privacy law in the United States and the concepts they include have played a significant role in the development of data protection laws around the globe. Understanding the Fair Information Practice Principles and how they should be implemented is critical to comply with the various privacy laws that protect personal information.

trans-unit.source: In order to be in line with Fair Information Practices we will take the following responsive action, should a data breach occur:
trans-unit.target: In order to be in line with Fair Information Practices we will take the following responsive action, should a data breach occur:

trans-unit.source: We will notify you via email within 7 business days
trans-unit.target: We will notify you via email within 7 business days

trans-unit.source: We will notify the users via in-site notification within 7 business days
trans-unit.target: We will notify the users via in-site notification within 7 business days

trans-unit.source: We also agree to the Individual Redress Principle which requires that individuals have the right to legally pursue enforceable rights against data collectors and processors who fail to adhere to the law. This principle requires not only that individuals have enforceable rights against data users, but also that individuals have recourse to courts or government agencies to investigate and/or prosecute non-compliance by data processors.
trans-unit.target: We also agree to the Individual Redress Principle which requires that individuals have the right to legally pursue enforceable rights against data collectors and processors who fail to adhere to the law. This principle requires not only that individuals have enforceable rights against data users, but also that individuals have recourse to courts or government agencies to investigate and/or prosecute non-compliance by data processors.

trans-unit.source: When it comes to the collection of personal information from children under the age of 13 years old, the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) puts parents in control. The Federal Trade Commission, United States' consumer protection agency, enforces the COPPA Rule, which spells out what operators of websites and online services must do to protect children's privacy and safety online.
trans-unit.target: When it comes to the collection of personal information from children under the age of 13 years old, the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) puts parents in control. The Federal Trade Commission, United States' consumer protection agency, enforces the COPPA Rule, which spells out what operators of websites and online services must do to protect children's privacy and safety online.

trans-unit.source: We do not specifically market to children under the age of 13 years old.
trans-unit.target: We do not specifically market to children under the age of 13 years old.

trans-unit.source: CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law's reach stretches well beyond California to require any person or company in the United States (and conceivably the world) that operates websites collecting Personally Identifiable Information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals or companies with whom it is being shared. - See more at: http://consumercal.org/california-online-privacy-protection-act-caloppa/#sthash.0FdRbT51.dpuf
trans-unit.target: CalOPPA is the first state law in the nation to require commercial websites and online services to post a privacy policy. The law's reach stretches well beyond California to require any person or company in the United States (and conceivably the world) that operates websites collecting Personally Identifiable Information from California consumers to post a conspicuous privacy policy on its website stating exactly the information being collected and those individuals or companies with whom it is being shared. - See more at: http://consumercal.org/california-online-privacy-protection-act-caloppa/#sthash.0FdRbT51.dpuf

trans-unit.source: According to CalOPPA, we agree to the following:
trans-unit.target: According to CalOPPA, we agree to the following:

trans-unit.source: Users can visit our site anonymously.
trans-unit.target: Users can visit our site anonymously.

trans-unit.source: Once this privacy policy is created, we will add a link to it on our home page or as a minimum, on the first significant page after entering our website.
trans-unit.target: Once this privacy policy is created, we will add a link to it on our home page or as a minimum, on the first significant page after entering our website.

trans-unit.source: Our Privacy Policy link includes the word 'Privacy' and can easily be found on the page specified above.
trans-unit.target: Our Privacy Policy link includes the word 'Privacy' and can easily be found on the page specified above.

trans-unit.source: Will I be notified of any Privacy Policy changes?
trans-unit.target: Will I be notified of any Privacy Policy changes?

trans-unit.source: You will be notified of any Privacy Policy changes on our Privacy Policy Page.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified of any Privacy Policy changes on our Privacy Policy Page.

trans-unit.source: How can I change my personal information?
trans-unit.target: How can I change my personal information?

trans-unit.source: You can change your personal information by logging in to your account.
trans-unit.target: You can change your personal information by logging in to your account.

trans-unit.source: How does our site handle Do Not Track signals?
trans-unit.target: How does our site handle Do Not Track signals?

trans-unit.source: We honor Do Not Track signals and Do Not Track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a Do Not Track (DNT) browser mechanism is in place.
trans-unit.target: We honor Do Not Track signals and Do Not Track, plant cookies, or use advertising when a Do Not Track (DNT) browser mechanism is in place.

trans-unit.source: Does our site allow third-party behavioral tracking?
trans-unit.target: Does our site allow third-party behavioral tracking?

trans-unit.source: It's also important to note that we do not allow third-party behavioral tracking
trans-unit.target: It's also important to note that we do not allow third-party behavioral tracking

trans-unit.source: The CAN-SPAM Act is a law that sets the rules for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messages, gives recipients the right to have emails stopped from being sent to them, and spells out tough penalties for violations.
trans-unit.target: The CAN-SPAM Act is a law that sets the rules for commercial email, establishes requirements for commercial messages, gives recipients the right to have emails stopped from being sent to them, and spells out tough penalties for violations.

trans-unit.source: We collect your email address in order to:
trans-unit.target: We collect your email address in order to:

trans-unit.source: Market to our mailing list or continue to send emails to our clients after the original transaction has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Market to our mailing list or continue to send emails to our clients after the original transaction has occurred.

trans-unit.source: To be in accordance with CANSPAM, we agree to the following:
trans-unit.target: To be in accordance with CANSPAM, we agree to the following:

trans-unit.source: Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.
trans-unit.target: Not use false or misleading subjects or email addresses.

trans-unit.source: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.
trans-unit.target: Identify the message as an advertisement in some reasonable way.

trans-unit.source: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.
trans-unit.target: Include the physical address of our business or site headquarters.

trans-unit.source: Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Monitor third-party email marketing services for compliance, if one is used.

trans-unit.source: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.
trans-unit.target: Allow users to unsubscribe by using the link at the bottom of each email.

trans-unit.source: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at contact@getnativelearning.com.
trans-unit.target: If at any time you would like to unsubscribe from receiving future emails, you can email us at contact@getnativelearning.com.
trans-unit.note: Instructions for how to unsubscribe from getnative emails

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions at the bottom of each email and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions at the bottom of each email and we will promptly remove you from ALL correspondence.

trans-unit.source: If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us using the information below.
trans-unit.target: If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may contact us using the information below.

Alternative text for image of first large homepage feature
The title of the video database feature description

trans-unit.source: getnative is all about breaking the barrier between fluid speech and native like speech. Our way of breaking the barrier is through intensive observation, pronunciation practice and active learning using video interviews of native speakers. Needless to say in order for this to work we need a lot of interview videos!
trans-unit.target: getnative is all about breaking the barrier between fluid speech and native like speech. Our way of breaking the barrier is through intensive observation, pronunciation practice and active learning using video interviews of native speakers. Needless to say in order for this to work we need a lot of interview videos!
trans-unit.note: The description of the video database feature
Alternative text for image of second large homepage feature
The title of the study session feature description

trans-unit.source: Wouldn't it be awesome to have an intense language study session in 15 minutes, or even 10? If you're an Advanced learner of the language you may already have your own study routine. But that study routine might include getting out books, scrolling through web pages -- it could take up to 10 minutes just to get all the materials ready!
trans-unit.target: Wouldn't it be awesome to have an intense language study session in 15 minutes, or even 10? If you're an Advanced learner of the language you may already have your own study routine. But that study routine might include getting out books, scrolling through web pages -- it could take up to 10 minutes just to get all the materials ready!
trans-unit.note: The description of the study session feature

trans-unit.source: A tool for advanced language learners
trans-unit.target: A tool for advanced language learners

trans-unit.source: A tool for advanced language learners
trans-unit.target: A tool for advanced language learners
trans-unit.note: The title for the advanced material feature description

trans-unit.source: getnative is most useful to language learners who already have a good command of the target language, yet want to make the speech sound more like that of a native speaker. Finding good study material is easy when you've just set out learning the target language. But as you advance, every day material like newspapers, journal articles, TV, podcasts and conversations with other speakers might become the core of your study routine.
trans-unit.target: getnative is most useful to language learners who already have a good command of the target language, yet want to make the speech sound more like that of a native speaker. Finding good study material is easy when you've just set out learning the target language. But as you advance, every day material like newspapers, journal articles, TV, podcasts and conversations with other speakers might become the core of your study routine.
